name: DanSparkling
description:
[DanSparkling] is a Music/Rhythm/Dance game that can be enjoyed with just one PC/Phone camera.

It's not how you follow the character.
Your character will be projected exactly as you move.

You can fully enjoy the songs of named artists in the rhythm games.
You can customize the character whose movements are projected in real time according to your taste.

Recognizes motion and operates with a single camera without a dedicated remote controller or sensor attached.
※ A webcam with a resolution of at least 480p or higher, 30FPS or higher, and an angle of view of 90˚ or higher must be connected to the PC.
※ You can mount your wired/wireless smartphone and use it INSTEAD of a webcam! This requires a third party app like Iriun or Camo.
※ See the detailed guide in [Community Hub].

!!! Please see our Discord for detailed instructions.
